intro:
Bounce, Trap, and Claim Your ground!
Engage in high-energy rhythm-meets-strategy battles across 100+ dynamic stages!
description:
◆A New Kind of Pogo Territory Battle!
Bounce, trap, and nail your tricks in high-speed territory duels set in futuristic battle arenas soaring high above the city under the night sky.

◆Master the Strategy
Every block on the field matters. Analyze the terrain in real time—decide what to cut, what to protect, and when to strike.
Split off zones to make them your own, then unleash powerful attacks fueled by the energy they generate.
But beware—fail to secure your path, and you’ll be cornered in seconds.
Every move has meaning.

◆Conquer the Solo Mode
Take on 45 rhythm-infused trials across 9 distinct areas.
Face complex patterns, strategic dilemmas, and mysterious foes.
Solo play is deep, challenging, and designed to sharpen your instincts.
And what lies beyond… may surprise you.

◆Local Multiplayer Mayhem (Up to 4 Players)
Dive into intense local PvP for up to 4 players!
Unlock and battle through over 100 carefully crafted stages packed with challenging gameplay that’s truly rewarding to master.
Every match creates new mind games—how will you outplay your rivals?
